verses.verse: Every <S%H2454>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> her <S%H1004>house,<s%> but the <S%H200>foolish<s%> one tears it <S%H2040>down<s%> with her own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but he who is <S%H3868>perverse<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%> despises <S%H959>him.<s%>
The <S%H191>fool<s%>'s <S%H6310>talk<s%> brings a <S%H2415>rod<s%> to his <S%H1346>back,<s%> but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> protect <S%H8104>them.<s%>
Where no <S%H504>oxen<s%> <S%H18>are,<s%> the crib is <S%H1249>clean,<s%> but <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> is by the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox.<s%>
A <S%H529>truthful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will not <S%H3577>lie,<s%> but a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H6315>pours<s%> out <S%H3576>lies.<s%>
A <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H1847>doesn't<s%> find it, but knowledge comes <S%H7043>easily<s%> to a discerning <S%H995>person.<s%>
<S%H3212>Stay<s%> <S%H5048>away<s%> from a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> for you <S%H3045>won't<s%> find <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> on his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
The <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> is to <S%H995>think<s%> about his <S%H1870>way,<s%> but the <S%H200>folly<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
<S%H191>Fools<s%> <S%H3887>mock<s%> at making atonement for <S%H817>sins,<s%> but among the <S%H3477>upright<s%> there is good <S%H7522>will.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> its <S%H5315>own<s%> <S%H4787>bitterness<s%> and <S%H6148>joy;<s%> he will not share <S%H8057>these<s%> with a <S%H2114>stranger.<s%>
The <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H8045>overthrown,<s%> but the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H6524>flourish.<s%>
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> which seems <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> but in the <S%H319>end<s%> it <S%H1870>leads<s%> to <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Even in <S%H7814>laughter<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> may be <S%H3510>sorrowful,<s%> and <S%H8057>mirth<s%> may <S%H319>end<s%> in <S%H8424>heaviness.<s%>
The <S%H5472>unfaithful<s%> will be <S%H7646>repaid<s%> for his <S%H3820>own<s%> <S%H1870>ways;<s%> likewise a <S%H2896>good<s%> man will be rewarded for his <S%H376>ways.<s%>
A <S%H6612>simple<s%> man <S%H539>believes<s%> <S%H1697>everything,<s%> but the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man carefully <S%H995>considers<s%> his <S%H838>ways.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H3373>fears,<s%> and <S%H5493>shuns<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> but the <S%H3684>fool<s%> is <S%H5674>hotheaded<s%> and <S%H982>reckless.<s%>
He who is <S%H7116>quick<s%> to become <S%H639>angry<s%> will <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H200>folly,<s%> and a <S%H4209>crafty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H8130>hated.<s%>
The <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H200>folly,<s%> but the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> are <S%H3803>crowned<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
The <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7817>bow<s%> down <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2896>good,<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> person is <S%H8130>shunned<s%> even by his own <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> but the <S%H6223>rich<s%> person has <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H157>friends.<s%>
He who <S%H936>despises<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2398>sins,<s%> but <S%H835>blessed<s%> is he who has <S%H2603>pity<s%> on the <S%H6035>poor.<s%>
<S%H8582>Don't<s%> they go astray who <S%H2790>plot<s%> <S%H7451>evil?<s%> But <S%H2617>love<s%> and <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> belong to those who <S%H2790>plan<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
In all hard <S%H6089>work<s%> there is <S%H4195>profit,<s%> but the <S%H1697>talk<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> leads only to <S%H4270>poverty.<s%>
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is their <S%H6239>riches,<s%> but the <S%H200>folly<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> crowns them with <S%H200>folly.<s%>
A <S%H571>truthful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H5337>saves<s%> <S%H5315>souls,<s%> but a <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H6315>witness<s%> is <S%H4820>deceitful.<s%>
In the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H5797>secure<s%> <S%H4009>fortress,<s%> and he will be a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for his <S%H1121>children.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H5493>turning<s%> people from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>

In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1927>glory,<s%> but in the <S%H657>lack<s%> of <S%H3816>people<s%> is the <S%H4288>destruction<s%> of the <S%H7333>prince.<s%>
He who is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> has <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> but he who has a <S%H7116>quick<s%> <S%H7307>temper<s%> <S%H7311>displays<s%> <S%H200>folly.<s%>
The <S%H2416>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>body<s%> is a <S%H3820>heart<s%> at <S%H4832>peace,<s%> but <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H7538>rots<s%> the <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
He who <S%H6231>oppresses<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shows <S%H2778>contempt<s%> for his <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> but he who is <S%H2603>kind<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%> honors <S%H3513>him.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is brought <S%H1760>down<s%> in his <S%H7451>calamity,<s%> but in <S%H4194>death,<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> has a <S%H2620>refuge.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H5117>rests<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of one who has <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and is even made <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H7130>inward<s%> part of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
<S%H6666>Righteousness<s%> <S%H7311>exalts<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> but <S%H2403>sin<s%> is a <S%H2617>disgrace<s%> to any <S%H3816>people.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7522>favor<s%> is toward a <S%H5650>servant<s%> who deals <S%H7919>wisely,<s%> but his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> is toward one who causes <S%H954>shame.<s%>
